text: Long travel day today. Lot of bus today.

This is a travel day.Today we are going from Aukland to Waitomo, some of us from the Bay of 
 Islands to Waitomo. Along the way we will be doing stuff, city tours, playing stuff on the DVD.

Tomorrow is a free day, which means you have one day which you can fill up with 
 activities, do whatever you like, or you can walk around the city, have a look around.

Bam. Look at that. We are in Waitomo. Isn't that crazy? I've just saved you guys 8 hr of bus ride...you wouldn't even know it. Yes, 
 we are in Waitomo. Really not much to here. It's literally just a town and these are our lodging that we are staying tonight

Basically, the reason we are staying here is because tomorrow we are going 
 to go caving. Waitomo caves is what this place is know for.

Oh my gosh, don't I look so attractive right now? I love this wet suits. We 
 are going to go black water rafting, which is like tubing in the caves

You see we have helmets and lovely, lovely 
 wet suits because its really col water.

This is so depressing. I am NOT allowed to film  Man: You are not allowed to film? Nadine: 
 No. I don't know what I'm going to do. Not allowed to film I am sorry guys.

Since, I wasn't allowed to film any of the black water rafting, some amazing 
 people have volunteer to reenact the entire experience for us. Ready for this?

Girl: So this is our version: Ready?Hands up. This is when we were on tubes, heals up, and this is when we 
 are going down the river, glow worms, wow, sweet. Nadine: What aout the waterfall part? Girl: waterfall, waterfall, get your tubes...

Ready..one, two three...jump! Paddle away...Nadine: What about the part that was dark? Girl:oh, 
 oh, my arms, I mean my eyes...Nadine: Find your way out ....
Wait..sunlight...Tube on your shoulder...we're out...Nadine: Pause for a photo...oh yea..
That was brilliant, that was perfect. That is exactly what happened.
What;s up? How is it going?

I am here at the Agradome, for a world renound sheep show.These guys here. I don't really know what's going to 
 happen on that stage over these. We'll see. It will be very interesting. (To sheep) Are you getting some treats?
She has had a hair cut ever since she was six months old.
These sheep come to us for sheering.
...she has to compensate for the wool lost...watch this...
Here we go. Pass it around...
So ladies and gentleman here are nineteen breeds of sheep. Thank you.
